actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to eliminate the requirement for preemployment alcohol testing in the mass transit, railroad, motor carrier, and aviation industries, and for other purposes.
short_title: Omnibus Transportation Employee Testing Act Amendments of 1995

summary.text: Omnibus Transportation Employee Testing Act Amendments of 1995 - Amends Federal transportation law to eliminate the requirement for preemployment alcohol testing of: (1) mass transit employees responsible for safety-sensitive functions; (2) railroad employees responsible for safety-sensitive functions; (3) operators of commercial motor vehicles; (4) air carrier employees responsible for safety-sensitive functions; and (5) Federal Aviation Administration employees responsible for safety-sensitive functions. Permits the preemployment testing for the use of alcohol by such employees.

titles.title: Omnibus Transportation Employee Testing Act Amendments of 1995

A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to eliminate the requirement for preemployment alcohol testing in the mass transit, railroad, motor carrier, and aviation industries, and for other purposes.
